description: This is an example of the JSON payload that EliteMining sends to the configured API endpoint
endpoint_note: The base URL is configurable in EliteMining settings. Default placeholder is https://elitemining.example.com

field_descriptions.timestamp: Session start time in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS)
field_descriptions.tph: Mining efficiency in tons per hour
field_descriptions.asteroids_with_materials: Number of asteroids that had tracked materials
field_descriptions.avg_quality_percent: Average material content percentage across all finds
field_descriptions.total_average_yield: Sum of all material average percentages
field_descriptions.materials_tracked: Number of different materials being tracked
field_descriptions.materials_mined.*.tph: Tons per hour for this material
field_descriptions.mineral_performance.*.prospected: Total asteroids prospected (shared across all materials)
field_descriptions.mineral_performance.*.hit_rate: Percentage of prospected asteroids containing this material

notes: The plugin sends this data when a mining session report is generated
Data is parsed from the TXT session report files
Failed uploads are queued and retried later
API endpoint can be configured in settings
